ORDERBLOCK.FORINFORMATION: FOR INFORMATION OR ORDER PLEASE CLICK ON LINKS BELOW

COURSE_CONTENT.VIDEO_TEXT: Video based on Italian meringue,with small amount of sugar, making of a basic filling.
COURSE_CONTENT.RECIPE_TEXT: Detailed description of the recipe, list of necessary ingredients, chocolate macaron recipe, macarons with  hand mixer .
COURSE_CONTENT.FILLINGS_TEXT: Macaron fillings' recipes, detailed description ,correct approach, storage methods.
COURSE_CONTENT.FEEDBACK_TEXT: Contacting  me for 3 months, discussions after doing a homework:
COURSE_CONTENT.DRAW_PRESENT_TITLE: How to take photos and present correctly?
COURSE_CONTENT.DRAW_PRESENT_TEXT: How to photograph and present a dessert , that is not less important  in our reality! What attracts a client at first is the appearance, which should be transferred as accurately as possible through the photo.
COURSE_CONTENT.BONUS_RECIPE_TEXT: A bonus recipe that will definitely not leave you indifferent - Cheesecake New York.

WHO_IS_FOR.FOR_WHO_IS_COURSE_BEGINNER_TEXT: If you are just starting out, you do not know how to attract customers? French macarons will help you in this matter, as they are always relevant and demanded
WHO_IS_FOR.FOR_WHO_IS_COURSE_PROFESSIONAL_TEXT: If you have skills in confectionery, it would be great to add it. Macarons will allow you to develop your mind: to have your own style in this area, as there are many ways to deliver it and be unique.
WHO_IS_FOR.FOR_WHO_IS_COURSE_MIDDLE_TEXT: It is a great option for those who like to cook and surprise their relatives or guests. It is served very nicely , they will definitely be satisfied with you :

EASY_TO_EARN.EASY_TO_PRODUCE_TITLE: It is easy to present in your own way
EASY_TO_EARN.EASY_TO_PRODUCE: Easy to present in your own way, you choose how to serve or decorate (if: the customer does not have a certain option)
EASY_TO_EARN.EASY_TO_KEEP: It is easy to store because they are very well stored in the freezer, besides you can save your time. And in case of a random order, it becomes easier to manage.
EASY_TO_EARN.POSSIBILITY_TO_EARN: It's a good way to make money, because if you are doing it with high quality and tasty it always has its demand. Expensive ingredients, therefore also high value: Of course, if you buy a lot of ingredients from the place you know it will be more convenient and  you will win twice as much.
